subject: Embargoes and Economic Sanctions
Tennis
United States Open (Tennis)
Officiating (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Adel Borghei, an Iranian umpire and referee, was selected to work at the United States Open — and then he wasn’t.
snippet: Adel Borghei, an Iranian umpire and referee, was selected to work at the United States Open — and then he wasn’t.
